name: Tiles - Multiplayer
description:
[ADDING NEW POWER UP]

[Game in development, Beta final]

Tiles is a simple multiplayer game created by I'm Gogole (hello it's me, I'm 16).

The objective? 

Conquer as much land as possible in a given time!

You can choose between different game modes:

- Default

- Teams

- Custom

You can choose "Customized" to choose your terrain, holes, time, and even power-ups!

Controls :

Forward : Z or Up Arrow

Back : S or Down Arrow

Left : Q or Left Arrow

Right D or Right Arrow

F5 : Disable or enable fullscreen

M : Show or hide minimap

Space (only in custom: power) : active power

Echap : Settings

[Credits]

I used a lot of music, sound effects and images from the internet. I will share with you the credit section soon.

The game is in development, I worked on this game alone, so I could not find many bugs to fix.

By the way, this game is only a help for another project I'm working on

Write me the major bugs you could find !

Thanks in advance for the support!
